items.text:
Five meters above the ground, you step out of the doorway leading
into the trunk of Lone Tree and onto the wildly swinging catwalk of
boards and rope. You keep a firm grip as you make your way toward
the massive boxes, each as large as a flatboat and overflowing with
plants that hang from the tree’s thick branches. As the wind shifts,
you catch the heady aroma of blooming flowers and ripe vegetables.
